recent.comments:
Audrey is a fantastic host. She is thoughtful and responsive; when we travelled, she proactively offered to get some groceries so we'd have them upon our return. When we forgot some important items in the unit, she immediately made sure we could get them back right away.

Highly recommended for longer stays. We stayed for eight weeks and would have stayed even longer. The house has ample space and is in a beautiful neighbourhood.

items.comments:
Audrey is a fantastic host. She is thoughtful and responsive; when we travelled, she proactively offered to get some groceries so we'd have them upon our return. When we forgot some important items in the unit, she immediately made sure we could get them back right away.

Highly recommended for longer stays. We stayed for eight weeks and would have stayed even longer. The house has ample space and is in a beautiful neighbourhood.

My friends and I loved this downtown location. It was close to everything we did that weekend. Audrey is super helpful and answers promptly when you contact her. The house looks exactly as photographed. As 8 women who can take a bit of time to get ready we appreciated the fact that each room had its own bathroom. We were able to wash and dry our clothes when we came back soaked from our niagara falls boat ride, super convenient. This house was very spacious and made our trip great.

Audrey's home was in a very pretty upscale, quiet neighborhood. It was very spacious and we loved all the amenities! There was plenty of street parking and it was so easy to drive to downtown. Thank you Audrey for sharing your home with us!
Had a great stay, house was clean and spacious. great location. Fast response and very helpful. Beautiful home, had everything we needed.
Audrey was a wonderful host! We stayed at Audrey's place for a work trip and the accommodations were beautiful and the perfect place to land at the end of a busy work day.
A lovely home that suited three couples and two kids! Aubrey was always quick to respond to our questions and was very friendly! Thank you for sharing your beautiful home Audrey!!

Audrey’s place is in a very nice and peaceful neighborhood, it’s all residential, don’t see any shops in the hood, so you definitely need a car. Audrey’s place is on the 2nd and 3rd level of a 2-family house, no noise/privacy issue, but just keep in mind you’ll have to walk up a fight of stairs in case you have elderly in your party. the place itself is absolutely lovely, nicely decorated and spacious bedrooms.

description.notes: Uber ride to Yorkville or Yonge and Bloor is about $8. We are close to all the action but in a beautiful up-scale area called Rosedale in the center of Toronto!
description.neighborhood:
EXQUISITE  HOME.

Rosedale has been ranked the best neighbourhood in Toronto to live in by Toronto Life Magazine.  Rosedale is an Affluent Neighbourhood  in central Toronto, Ontario.  It is located in  Downtown Toronto (near the centre of the city close to Yorkville)
and is one of its oldest neighbourhoods.   It is also one of the wealthiest and most highly priced neighbourhoods in Canada.

It was formerly the estate of William Botsford Jarvis, and so named by his wife, granddaughter of William Dummer Powell, for the wild roses that grew there in abundance.
description.transit: Close to the Rosedale TTC station, just 1 TTC stop north of the center of the city at Yonge and Bloor streets.

description.summary: Welcome to Haven on Heaven. At our beautiful 4-bedroom home, enjoy indoor/outdoor living minutes from the Velodrome and Glen Eden/Kelso. This home offers privacy, peace and quiet in a family friendly neighbourhood.  Curl up and stream on our cozy sectionals with either of our two smart TV's. Stay productive at one of two dedicated work spaces. We have a high chair for your young one. Enjoy a serene countryside drive or hop on the 401 in minutes. Easy access to Downtown Toronto and Niagara Falls.
description.neighborhood: Ford is a quiet, family friendly and highly desirable neighbourhood in Milton. While it's minutes away from major freeways, you won't hear any of it. This home is surrounded by families and their pets so it's lively during the day. People of this neighbourhood call it a night early and you won't be disturbed in the evening. While the area is residential and close to an elementary school, it's not far from exciting hiking and biking trails, perfect for the summer.
description.transit: The home is located just off Britannia which connects to Highway 25. The closest train stations are Milton GO & Bronte GO. If you're driving you can access the 401, 407 or the QEW all within a short drive. We provide parking indoors in the garage and outside on the driveway. There is additional parking available on the street, just look for the signage. Please refer to Town of Milton bylaws on milton.ca
description.house_rules:
1. Please indicate total number of guests including adults, children and infants in the reservation. We do not permit any guests that are unaccounted for in the booking. We do not allow a bigger group gathering at any times other than the ones booked initially. This is a pet-free property.

2. We require the internet to be connected at all times during your stay. The security cameras require internet and therefore disconnecting will be considered tampering with security and is against Airbnb policy.

3. We don't allow smoking/vaping anywhere on our property including the patio. Please refrain from using candles during your stay. 

3. Please take off shoes at entrance. 

4. We don't allow parties/events on our property at any time. We have zero tolerance to any group gatherings/parties and will result in termination of stay. Please keep the noise to a minimum after 10:00pm-7:00am as per Milton noise bylaws. The property is located in a residential peaceful family neighborhood. 

5. The property, all electronics and furnishings should be left clean, tidy and undamaged, in their provided conditions and places. Any damages to the walls, stains/damage on carpet or furniture, scratch marks on the floor, damage to the appliances will be subject to a repair or replacement charge to the guest. 

6. Please try and restrict laundry usage from 7:00 pm to 7:00 am. 

7. Please follow the link for weekly schedule of waste disposal in Milton: 

Online Waste Collection Schedule - 
https://www.halton.ca/For-Residents/Recycling-Waste/Recycling-and-Waste-Tools/Online-Waste-Collection-Schedule

8- There are two car parkings. One in our garage and one on the driveway on our side of the townhouse. Street parkings are available but are subject to permission as per Milton parking bylaws. Please follow street signs and check the town website: https://www.milton.ca/en/living-in-milton/parking.aspx

Families with kids or groups of friends will love our place that backs onto a park with trails nearby, Tim Hortons and McDonald’s within walking distance. We are infant-friendly, with play pen, by-your-side sleeper, play mat, portable rocker & baby dinnerware. Free parking for 2cars
description.space: This apartment is in the main floor of a detached house. It has 3 bedrooms and 2.5 washrooms: 1 king bed, 1 queen bed, 1 twin-over-double bunkbed, a living room, dining area, and a full kitchen.
description.access: You will not have access to the basement, but can access the laundry in the basement if need to.
description.notes:
We also have rental properties in Hamilton if you want to visit the city or stop by on the way to Niagara Falls. Please find them using the property names, or feel free to ask me:

3-bedroom main floor apartment - Name: "Hamilton: 3bdrm, king bed, large patio, near trail"

1-bedroom basement apartment with a king bed and a double-sized sofa bed - Name: "Greenhill bsmt unit | King bed | Spacious patio"

1-bedroom basement apartment with queen bed - Name: "Bsmt apartment, quiet neighborhood, free parking"
description.neighborhood: The best part about this neighborhood is quietness and safety. You can see few cars travelling on the road right in front of our house but can easily blend in the traffic once you get out of that road. What our guests love most is having a park right behind our backyard and our proximity to nearby trails and sightseeing places. As you may know, Mississauga is the second-most populous city in the Greater Toronto Area (GTA) after Toronto itself, third-most in Ontario, and seventh-most in Canada. Mississauga is historically known as Toronto Township - its growth was attributed to its proximity to Toronto. Plus, it can be considered to be an ideal stop between Toronto and some other cities such as Oakville, Burlington, Hamilton, and Niagara Falls.
description.transit: Free parking for 2 cars in the driveway.
description.interaction: We are very responsive via the Airbnb app. However, please feel free to reach out to me via my phone number should you need to. My number is shared via the app once the booking is confirmed.

Thank you for your understanding!

hosts.about: That pic was taken of my dad and I when we were traveling throughout Ireland a few years ago! Brandon (my other man) & I are lovers of travel, anything adventure & outdoors, cycling, ice hockey and animals. We are bee keepers and rehabbers. We spent 4 years tearing this old building down, rebuilding it and in-between we discovered an old barn with a lot of character. With some grit and a whole lotta help we spent many days & nights piecing together around the integrity of the original structure. At a few points we thought about burning it,  some days I wanted to call Joanna Gaines and ask her "how the heck do this"? Then there were the thoughts of just walking away but, we pushed through. It's not perfect, but it's pretty darn close... and such is life. We hope you are traveling with someone you can take time to really enjoy the moments with and make amazing memories with in our labor of love. We especially hope however short or long, you make your stay in Ellicottville a special one. Enjoy the memories, live for the moments! All our best, Kristie & Brandon

description.summary: A true sanctuary, this 2200 sq ft multi-level chalet sleeps 10 (adults + kids) & features 3 bed (3 kings), + 1 dbl bunk, + 1 trpl bunk +1 full mem foam mattress pull out couch/3 full bath + 1 steam bath + 1 sauna. Option (ask) to add adjoining unit #8 to sleep up to 10 total. Smart TVs, gourmet kitch, gas fireplace,  lndry, dishwasher, wifi. 2 story floor to ceiling glass great room, huge deck & spectacular views out onto the pond. 1 min drive to village, 4 min to Holimont, 6 min to HV.
description.space: Armed with grit and determination to please this “Powerhouse”, The Cam Neely, the largest of five residences, stays true to the name by a multitude of factors including its’ size, strength, distinctive characteristics and of course, entertainment. Come gripped with anticipation and leave a little rattled by possibly too much stimulation yet relaxed and completely satisfied! Though your stay may be short, The Cam Neely is a beast among beasts so, worry not, you should be prepared to get your money’s worth and leave with memories to last a lifetime. This brand new wide open floor plan boasts large amounts of natural light with huge windows, a quartz counter top kitchen and new stainless appliances to cook your favorite meals. Come together around the Modern Farmhouse table looking out through the sliding glass doors overlooking the pond and enjoy the sounds of the wild around you. Vaulted ceilings provide an open air appeal and a separate sauna and steam room offer a variety of options to warm up after a great day out on the slopes. Dream deeply on our brand new Beauty Rest mattresses or if your the lucky one on the couch enjoy the memory foam mattress that feels like a bed. Plenty of parking for all in a brand new setting with 5 acres of a beautiful wilderness backdrop close to everything.
description.access: The entire two-story suite is accessible by the left side of the building stairs. There are two large decks, a gas grill and 5 acres to roam with a fire pit directly outside the sliding glass doors in the back.
description.notes: This is 1 of 5 units and can be combined with unit #8 through an adjoining fire door to house 10 people (adults and children) comfortably yet still offer a bit of privacy. Any party/group larger than 8 adults is subject to approval by host as well as any long term rentals during high season. This IS NOT a party house. This unit is a 3-bedroom, 5 bunks ideal for couples and children. Adding the adjoining unit makes it a 4-bedroom. There are additional options for multiple bookings upon availability for private gatherings and Covid safe holidays. Quiet hours are between 10pm & 8am.

description.transit: Your stay is just under 1 mile into the village. It's walkable if you like to walk, would take about 10 minutes. It's easily done on a bike but most  comfortable in a car (less than 1 minute). 6 minute drive to Holiday Valley & 4 minutes to Holimont Ski Hill & Resort.

hosts.about: We live near by and ready to answer any questions you may have  at any time your satisfaction is our priority.

recent.comments:
We stayed at Alair’s place for a girls weekend which included hiking all day in Letchworth State Park.  
It was a perfect place for us to relax and enjoy each others company.  There was plenty of room to gather and unwind  after a long day hiking. 
It was 20 minutes to the entrance of the park.  It’s a beautiful area.  
The place is well stocked with everything you need for a wonderful stay.

We would definitely stay there again.  
Thank you!!

items.comments:
We stayed at Alair’s place for a girls weekend which included hiking all day in Letchworth State Park.  
It was a perfect place for us to relax and enjoy each others company.  There was plenty of room to gather and unwind  after a long day hiking. 
It was 20 minutes to the entrance of the park.  It’s a beautiful area.  
The place is well stocked with everything you need for a wonderful stay.

We would definitely stay there again.

Good value
Our stay was great. The house had plenty of space and all the amenities we needed. The outside space was great as well. Alair was very responsive and provided clear communications.

Alair is an awesome host! She's really quick to respond and helpful. The instructions she provided for checking in at Mill Street Manor were super useful. The house is beautiful, spacious, and well-organized. Plus, it's only about an hour's drive away from cool places like Niagara Falls, the Corning Museum of Glass, Letchworth State Park, and Watkins Glen. If we're ever back in the area, we'll definitely stay here again.
A great relaxing place to stay while hiking in Letchworth St. Park.

We had an amazing time at Alair's house. 4 generations ranging from 4 to 82. the kitchen had every appliance we could need, and the house was stocked with so many towels and blankets. 

There are Train tracks that run through the back yard. I dont recall this in the listing, but I may have missed it. our kids loved running to the deck and watching the trains go by. 

We did have an issue the first night with no hot water, but Alair was able to get that fixed the quickly the next day. 

The house is about a half hour from a grocery store, which isn't idle, but not awful, and not a lot of restaurants nearby. Regardless, we had an amazing time, and used the house as a base for our vacation around Letchworth State park. 

Would gladly stay here again if we are in the area!
Loved this place!! Has everything you could want in a great location. Would love to go back!!

description.house_rules:
Dear Guests:

We hope you are looking forward to your upcoming stay.

Here are some necessary directions in anticipation of your arrival:

Destination:
Beaveridge Ave. 
Oakville, L6H 0M7

This is a new constructed area, so your GPS might not have been updated, please use (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) map on your handheld, or print out the map in advance.

Please do not park on the road, we have a driveway for 2 cars.

Keys: your will find it in the lock-box at the entrance. The code will be sent to you in a separate email.

Check-in: Please be informed that our checking in time is after 4pm, and checking out deadline is 11am. Early check-in is not allowed, as we might have other guests in the house or the house is under cleaning.

Amenities: You are welcome to use the kitchen and dining room.

Please understand that this house is also our club house, and we have some personal belongings here, would very much appreciate it if you would leave them where they are. We store most of our stuff in the basement, which is not included in the rent.

Only guests registered(paid) on the reservation were allowed in the house.


Facility settings: The heating/air-conditioning thermostat is preset, please don't reset it(but you can always adjust it).

Laundry: Please run them at night and weekends, 7pm-7am.

Shopping: There are some main supermarkets on Dundas Rd. Walmart/Superstore/Canadian Tires, banks and restaurants.

Emergency Information: In case of Emergency dial 911.

Fire Extinguisher: Located at the entrance of the garage to the house.

Monitoring System: we have a monitoring camera at the entrance.
 
Wifi:
SSID:Welcome to Paradise
Password: from2012



Checkout:
On the morning of your checkout please do the following:
• Bring all trash to the dumpsters in the garage.
• Place all towels and sheets on the floors of the bathrooms. (optional)
• Please run the dishwasher and return dishes, cups, and utensils to their proper cabinets and drawers.
•Be sure to turn off the gas(on the stove) and lock all doors, put key back into the lock-box.
• Please remember to leave an entry in our guest book – we love to hear from our guests.
• Please remember to leave a comment on Airbnb, and we would reward a CAD30 discount for your next stay.
For any other issues, call Eve at (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN).

hosts.about:
Hi!  I spend my life between Cassadaga Lakes, NY and my office in Pittsburgh, PA. I grew up in Jamestown, NY. I own a graphic and website design firm called - Blue Tomato Design and an interior design firm called Blue Tomato Spaces.  I LOVE to renovate and restore old spaces. My two dogs Moggy and Mosey, love being at Blue Oar Lakehouse and Blue Canoe Lake Cottage!

The surrounding Lake Erie area is so beautiful and the people of this small Western NY town are so nice!  I fell in love instantly as I'm sure you will too. In the summers, drive to Bemus Point on Chautauqua Lake and have drinks at the Hotel Lenhart in the rocking chairs on the porch and watch the sunset and then head over to Ellicottville Brewery for dinner.  Saturdays are great days for beer tasting and live music at Southern Tier Brewery or exploring the Wine Trail. Sundays are usually spent at the lake just relaxing, kayaking and swimming. Private beach areas with fire pits at both Blue locations - right on the water. In the winter hit up Holiday Valley ski resort and then head to Ellicottville Brewery for drinks and dinner before heading back to the lake. Tarbox Road Recording Studio is a 4 minute drive. Lily Dale is only a 2 minute drive or easy walk. Open year round.

recent.comments: Great rental with a host of water toys. Home and grounds are well maintained.

items.comments: Great rental with a host of water toys. Home and grounds are well maintained.
Very nice spot excellent host

We had a great time.  When not on the water, the kids had a great area to play in the back yard.   The facilities have all the amenities you need to enjoy your stay, kayaks, paddle boards, pedal boat, and a swim mat.  We are looking forward to renting it again next year.
Lovely home that is very well appointed. Very clean and comfortable. Kimberly was responsive and terrific. We’ll be back.

Kimberly was a tremendous host…  We stayed at the Blue Oar years ago and was very pleased, and to our satisfaction, this stay was almost identical.  The effort to keep up condition of the house and make improvements was obvious!  Kim’s attention to detail is noteworthy, every thing you could need was at our disposal.  We felt very comfortable and attended to during our visit.  I would recommend this Airbnb to anyone.
Very charming house and a good host. Will look to stay here in the future
Great place, very clean and organized. Kimberly is a very communicative and attentive host.

description.summary:
Luxe 4 Bed/3 Bath Cassadaga Lakefront-Chautauqua, LilyDale

BLUE OAR LAKEHOUSE 

If we are booked on the dates you are looking for, check out our newest lakefront property- Blue Canoe!!! 2 bed/1 bath-ON WATER!!

Upscale 4 bedroom, 3 full bathroom lakehouse. Luxury on the lake. Located directly on Cassadaga Lakes with gorgeous full lake views with private dock and 75ft beach. Public boat launch. Dog Friendly. Small town, quiet year round family neighborhood. 3 minutes to Lily Dale, The Red House.
description.space:
INTERIOR FEATURES

KITCHEN

Kitchen is Fully Stocked. Samsung refrigerator with ice/water maker, Kitchen Aid convection range, LG dishwasher, septic-safe garbage disposal, industrial sink faucet, microwave, Cuisinart blender, 4 slice toaster, Kitchen Aid Mixer, Keurig Coffee Maker, cloth napkins, dish towels, white dishes, baking dishes, variety of serving platters, knives, cookware & stainless steel flatware. Kitchen nook for morning coffee.

BEDROOMS

4 bedrooms and 3 full bathrooms. Sleeps 8 comfortably. Pack-n-play and highchair for little ones.

FIRST FLOOR BEDROOM

Queen bedroom with full bathroom & tub.

SECOND FLOOR BEDROOMS

Master Suite features King Tempu-Pedic bed, wall-to-wall modern carpeting, cove ceiling with recessed lighting, double sink vanity and soaking whirlpool jet tub.  

Queen bedroom with Queen bed and Twin bedroom with 2 Twin beds share a large full bathroom.

Each bathroom features custom carrara marble tile. Hardwood floors throughout house. 

Separate dining and livingroom. Table seats 6 plus two wingback chairs for cocktails. Livingroom features HUGE sectional, TV, ceiling fan and amazing view of lake with access to front porch. 

A small office off the front foyer is great for getting work done.

OTHER AMENITIES

LG stackable washer and dryer on second floor. 

Central Air. Ceiling fans. Nest Thermostat. 

Cable TV and WiFi. New Electric Fireplace!!

Keurig.

OUTSIDE FEATURES

PARKING

Large new driveway with parking pad for 2 additional cars for easy unloading through new covered back porch. large 4 car garage.

Generous covered front porch with rocking chairs and porch swing with amazing full view of the lake. New lakefront landscaping with pea gravel beach and firepit area. New Private Floating dock with 4 adirondack chairs for enjoying the view. Public Boat Launch. Large driveway that can hold multiple vehicles. Large 4 car garage with covered patio features a propane grill and 2 large picnic tables for entertaining. Outdoor fire pit for evening smores. 4 kayaks, 4 bikes and yard games.

AREA FUN

Farm stands, Amish Country, Southern Tier Brewery, Ellicottville Brewery, Bemus Point, Lily Dale, Tarbox Road Recording Studio, Wineries, The Red House Wedding Barn, Chautauqua Lake, kayaking, hiking, biking, fishing, Holiday Valley Ski Resort, Peek n' Peak Ski Resort, & snowmobiling are some of the fun activities you'll find near this beautiful get-a-way. You'll never want to leave!
description.access: The entire property is accessible to guests.
description.notes: I rent to 30 year olds and above. This is a sleepy town - not a party town. This property is for family and guests that are looking for a quiet, relaxing place to get-a-way.
description.neighborhood: Small town, quiet year round family neighborhood on Cassadaga Lakes.
description.transit:
You’ll need to take a drive for restaurants and shopping. There are 2 sit restaurants in town: Cassadaga Country Club and The Whiskey Hill Saloon that is 21 yrs and older and cash only. JoJo’s Asian Cafe offers a take-out menu. There is a Dollar General on the main Route 60 in Cassadaga.

We provide 4 bicycles, helmets, 4 kayaks, 2 paddle boards, 1 child's kayak, a pedal boat and life jackets and a floating mat. Beautiful bike rides around the lakes. Lots of neat small towns nearby to drive to. Wineries, breweries, farm stands throughout the area.
description.interaction: I have a property manager available to assist with any questions/issues. Emergencies should be directed to 911.
description.house_rules:
VEHICLES/PARKING

Please drive under 20 MPH on Lakeview Avenue as this is a private neighborhood road and children and dogs live in the area.

You may park in the driveway or 4 car garage. Additional parking is available behind the house around the bend off of Pettit Place.

DO NOT PARK IN THE STREET.


NOISE

Quiet family-oriented town

Water carries sound - please be courteous

Outside quiet hours are from 11:00pm-8:00am


DOG OWNERS

Dogs must be treated for Fleas/Ticks/Heartworms.

Pick up all dog waste in poo bags and throw out in the small gray can in garage labeled "DOG POO BAGS". There are Poo Bags Available. 

Dogs must be leashed.


GARBAGE

Garbage night is THURSDAY.

Please throw Dog Poo Garage in cans and wheel to curb.


WATERFRONT

75ft of private waterfront and floating dock. Highly recommend children have properly fitted lifejackets and water shoes. NO DIVING.

description.summary: Luxe living in Corso Italia! Unwind in our design-forward, beautiful home.  Enjoy soaring 10ft ceilings with sun-filled, spacious rooms, skylight over the grand staircase, fully equipped chef's kitchen, 3 bedrooms (2 with dedicated workspaces), 4th sleeping area in rec-room, reliable internet, walk out to our backyard oasis with hot tub, and parking. Amidst the best of St Clair West's trendy restaurants, fruit markets, butchers, public swimming pool, playground, and streetcar line to the subway!
description.space:
This new-build home has all the bells and whistles! This lovely 3+ bedroom, 3.5 bathroom + basement home is perfect for travellers, friends, families, and those in the city for business!

The upper level boasts a beautiful principal bedroom suite featuring a king-sized bed, smart TV, ensuite bathroom, and jacuzzi tub. The second bedroom sleeps two with trundle bed, and a single bed in the third bedroom. The upper level sleeps five in total. The large basement rec-room with big screen TV is equipped with a sleeping space for a sixth guest. 

The gorgeous backyard space includes new gourmet BBQ and spacious dining area covered with remote controlled awning, oversized sectional couch and fire table, and majestic stone walk-up to hot tub.

There is a dedicated desk-space for working in each of the second and third bedrooms, with reliable internet connection and super fast fibre-optic speeds up to 1.5 Gbps.

There is at least one available parking spot on the property, depending on the time of year.  We can let you know exactly how many at the time of booking, or you can message us to inquire.

Looking forward to hosting you!
description.access: The entire home is yours to enjoy!  (There are a few storage and utility rooms that are locked.)
description.notes:
*The person making the reservation must be 25 years old or older.
*For group reservations, the host may request ID information for each individual guest. 
*There are security cameras on the exterior of the premises only, at the front and back of the house. There are no security cameras inside the house.
*If your dates are not available in our calendar, feel free to message us to inquire.  This home is our primary residence, and we can occasionally be flexible with availability.
description.neighborhood:
Vibrant and safe, Corso Italia is Toronto's "original"
Little Italy, producing some of the best pizza,
gelato, and baked treats in the city. Five minutes
walk to the west are Earlscourt Park and JJP
Communitv Centre, with indoor and outdoor
pools, splash pad, playground, outdoor running
track, fitness equipment, tennis court, and skating
rink. With a neighbourhood feel, you're steps
to the St Clair West streetcar, connecting you to
everything Toronto has to offer.
description.transit:
Central and highly walkable neighbourhood. Steps from St Clair West and streetcar line that connects directly to the subway. Toronto Bike Share station at the end of the block, with traditional bicycles and e-bikes available to rent.  
Parking for at least 1 car.

hosts.about:
Hello dear!  I’m Jenny, I’m so glad we met here!  When I was a child, I was born in a rural village in China. When I was young, my family’s economic conditions were not good. 20 years ago, my parents gave me very little amount of money to go outside to work.

Fortunately, after working hard for a period of time, I accumulated a little bit of money and then I borrowed more money from relatives and friends.  Then I started my life’s business. I rented a shop along the street. It was only 9 square meters. I needed to open the shop during the day. At night I closed the rolling door and laid a mat and quilt. The concrete floor is my bed. I have been sleeping from August in the summer to winter in December and keep on the concrete floor every night for more than 4 months. Since then, I have had a beautiful dream and a wish in my heart. I hope everyone can sleep in a comfortable bed at every night in the world, Everyone can have a warm and comfortable home in the world, and wake up happy every day from their sweet sleep and start an energy day!

 So fortunately, I met the Airbnb platform three years ago, which allowed me to realize my dream. It can really provide every guest with a comfortable accommodation, just as warm, lovely and clean as guests living in their own homes , Comfortable, and extremely satisfied!

I treat every guest as my family. I believe that every guest who has stayed in here before they can deeply feel that my enthusiasm was really from my heart. I provide guests with high quality beds, bedding, furniture, and home appliances, Kitchen supplies, etc., these are all brands that I am using now, and even some home appliances are more high quality than I used. I love my passion business and which can provide warm and sincere love to all customers. It is precisely because of my enthusiasm and love from my career, even if I finished cleaning the toilet each time that I feel very proud and so happy, because I can imagine my guests if he or she using the toilet that they will definitely feel Jenny's dedication and warmly heart, love, honestly, passion,  the guests will be so happy because each room is So clean, so neat, so beautiful, and so comfortable!

 I always say to my guests: "My dear, Here will always be your own home if you have  lived here, You are very welcome to come back home again anytime, and the lights at home will be turned on for you at any time!" In fact, It’s really the truth, All the guests who was lived here before they all loved the stayed very much. Thanks God for arranging we meet each other, Love you my Dear!  God will always bless you and Your family Dear!

recent.comments: Great place that is located in a quiet location. The property is well equipped with all the essentials and Jenny is a very attentive host.

Hi! We’re Evolve, the hospitality team that helps you rest easy when you rent a private, professionally cleaned home from us.

We promise your rental will be clean, safe, and true to what you saw on Airbnb or we'll make it right. Check-ins are always smooth, and we're here 24/7 to answer any questions or help you find the perfect property.

recent.comments: Clean, updated home, well decorated, side porch is large and nice to sit out on. Kitchen is nice and updated. Loved the master bath and bedroom. 18-20 mins away from all things Chautauqua Lake. Right on a corner with gas station / deli.

items.comments: Clean, updated home, well decorated, side porch is large and nice to sit out on. Kitchen is nice and updated. Loved the master bath and bedroom. 18-20 mins away from all things Chautauqua Lake. Right on a corner with gas station / deli.

A lovely old-world Victorian home, tastefully decorated with quality furniture and bedding. Rooms were spacious and gave our family of four plenty of space to stretch out. The kitchen and bathrooms were very nicely updated as well. The house was very clean too! We were there to visit nearby family, and it was a great and convenient location for that (and right near a mini-mart for provisions!) However there was a bit of street noise in the bedrooms because it is located on a busy intersection. It didn’t interfere with us sleeping though. We will be back!

description.summary: Trade the busy streets and noisy city for a peaceful small-town getaway at this Gerry vacation rental. From the fully stocked kitchen to the furnished deck, this 3-bedroom, 3-bath home offers everything you’ll need for a relaxing retreat. Enjoy watching movies with your family on the Smart TV, home-cooked meals on the grill, and catching a breeze out on the porch swing. With several golf courses, parks, and Chautauqua Lake just minutes away, it’s the perfect place for your next serene getaway!

recent.comments: Amazing house, fantastic and quiet neighbourhood, and awesome host. It was a great stay. The house is spacious, with lots of natural light and a beautiful back yard. Many things to do and places to walk around the neighbourhood, we only took Ubers to go downtown. The host is very friendly and definitely knows how to take good care of guests. If you're looking for a nice place that will feel like home, where you can relax but that is also within walking distance of all sorts of stores and restaurants, then this is the place. Will come back 10/10.

description.summary: As one of only a hand full of residences that back directly onto Trinity Bellwoods park this home offers the perfect combination of downtown access with park-life energy.   A chef's kitchen, open floor plan, large bedrooms, dedicated workspace and flower filled back yard make this location a perfect home while working or exploring the city.  Steps away from Queen West and Ossington Street, two of the most dynamic neighbourhoods in Toronto.
description.space:
The house was built in 1889 so get ready for some "old world charm". The Victorian details of the house have all been preserved, and the floors my slope a bit but the interior has been updated with a modern kitchen and comfortable contemporary design.  

The central air conditioning works well on the main floor but as is the case with most older homes,  has a bit of trouble cooling the second floor so fans have been provided in each room to help with the occasional heat wave.  Large trees in the front and in the back of the property provide great natural shade. 

Since this is a "family home" as opposed to a full-time rental suite,  the vibe is pretty quiet and family oriented. 

The back gate of the property opens into Trinity Bellwoods park where there is plenty of green space, tennis courts, as well as a splash pad and play ground for children.  The Trinity Bellwoods Community Centre offers free open swimming and other free weekly activities for children.
description.access: Guests have access to the basement, main and upper floors of the home as well as the back yard (private).  There is a rental suite in part of the basement but it is entirely separate from the laundry facilities that you will have access to which are also in the basement.
description.neighborhood:
Queen West voted the second coolest neighbourhood in the  world by Vogue Magazine: 

"Toronto is currently enjoying newfound prominence—and desirability—amongst globe-trotting tastemakers. Queen Street West is a verifiable artery of indie patisseries, homegrown labels, and hidden-from-view galleries—hallmarks of hipness, if ever they existed. It’s also the home of well-established “art” hotels The Drake and the Gladstone, and Soho House Toronto is nearby, as is Graffiti Alley, a block where street art is both 100 percent legal and lauded"
description.house_rules:
Reservations must not exceed a maximum 4 guests.  The number of guests must be respected.   

Please be aware that this is a family home and not a hotel so please do not move furniture, lighting or artwork.    Ample space will be made in all bedroom closets but some personal items may remain in view.  

There is a permanent tenant in the basement suite so please be mindful of the noise level on the main floor by removing foot ware indoors.

description.summary: Indulge in a serene escape at our spectacular 5-bedroom lakefront haven in Hamilton / Stoney Creek, Ontario. Our tranquil abode accommodates up to 10 guests with plush queen-sized beds in each room. Enjoy unobstructed views of Lake Ontario from tastefully-appointed rooms or the second-floor balcony. Relish in the convenience of the propane fire table and barbecue grill for al fresco dining. Take in panoramic views of the GTA & Toronto skyline.
description.space:
Our lakefront home has 5 bedrooms all with queen sized mattresses. 

The main floor of our home is open concept and has lots of windows facing the lake. Our kitchen is fully equipped with stainless steel appliances and is open to our dining area and main living space. The main floor also has a half bath/powder room. 

The upstairs of the home has 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. Two of the bedrooms have glass sliding door access to the second floor balcony and one of the bedrooms has an ensuite bathroom. 

The basement of the home has 2 additional bedrooms, a full washroom, a laundry room, and a large open unfurnished rec. space. 

Our home is set up for hosting guests and we look forward to providing you a great lakefront home to stay at.

LIABILITY MESSAGE:
By booking your stay with us, you acknowledge that you are aware of the risks connected with activity by and/or on the lake. You agree to not hold accountable or bring legal action against the property management company, the co-hosts, or the owners of the home. This message and your booking with us releases the property management company from all liability relating to injuries that may occur on location before, during, or after activity. You also agree to hold the property management company, co-hosts, and owners of the home free from any liability, including financial responsibility for injuries incurred, regardless of the reasons or circumstances.

You acknowledge the risk involved with activities by and/or on the lake including, but not limited to, sprains, slips and falls, or other physical injuries. You certify that your participation is voluntary and you have been made aware of the risks. Additionally, you do not have any conditions that may increase your likelihood of injury.
description.access:
Guests have access to our entire lakefront home including the full house, all of the driveway parking spaces, and the backyard Our home is set up primarily for hosting guests and we take pride in making sure it is fully equipped and ready for guests to enjoy their stay. The main entrance has a lockbox and guests are given the code prior to arriving via our check-in messages.

Guests do not have access to the garage or the cement pier as it is old and not to be used for safety. The cement pier can be slippery when wet or cold.
description.notes:
Our home has a smart TV, high speed WIFI, free on-site parking, board games, and much more. 

Enjoy breathtaking sunrises and sunsets from our lakefront home.
*Please note there is no direct water access from the property.*

There is a $25/person/night extra charge for groups larger than 6. 

Check in is anytime after 4pm and check out is anytime before 10am.

Our home is primarily set up for hosting guests and is perfect for groups of friends and families.

We live in the area so please don't hesitate to contact us if you need anything.

For the fastest response time, the best form of communication is through the Airbnb chat platform as we have multiple eyes on it. We can also be reached by call or text for emergencies only.

There is a security camera at the front of the house to monitor for intruders, animals, and guest numbers, as well as noise sensors measuring decibals only to monitor for excessive noise/parties.

Enjoy your stay in Stoney Creek / Hamilton!
description.neighborhood:
Our lakefront home is located on a quiet street and our property backs directly onto Lake Ontario. 

The property is easily accessible from the QEW highway. 

We are located close to a few public parks & beaches. 

2 minute drive to the exquisite Edgewater Manor Restaurant. 

3-4 minute drive to the Gateway Ice Centre, Players Paradise Sports Complex, and Ultimate Exotics Luxury Car Rentals.
description.transit: We recommend having a vehicle to get around to most places like restaurants, stores, etc. There are also Uber and Lyft drivers in the area. Our property has space for 4-5 cars in the driveway. There are a few local parks, beaches, and conservation areas nearby that guests can enjoy.
description.interaction: While the unit is fully equipped to ensure a great stay, there can sometimes be needs for you to contact us. We're always available if you have questions or need recommendations via the Airbnb messaging platform.
description.house_rules:
- Guests agree to read, understand, and adhere to the Liability Message in the listing description (if applicable)

- No shoes on inside the home

- No smoking inside the home or outside near an open door or window

- No mailing packages

- Only the number of guests on the reservation is allowed at the property

- No partying of any kind, inside or on the property. The neighbourhood is quiet in the evenings. Noise level must be minimal after 10 PM.

- No noise shall travel through the neighbor's property line after 10:00 PM and before 7:00 AM from any sound source.

Smoking Policy:

- Smoking is prohibited inside the house and by a door or window.

- Smoking is allowed outside only with doors and windows closed.

- Violation of the smoking policy will result in forfeiture of the full security deposit and damage liability of up to $2,500 for any discovered damage to furniture or any odours.

Occupancy and Usage:

- Guests are not allowed to exceed the agreed-upon occupancy limit.

- The property should be used for residential purposes only and in a careful manner to prevent any damages or loss.

Towels/Linens:

- Towels and linens are for sleeping and drying clean hands/body only.

- Replacement towels or extra cleaning may incur a minimum service and cleaning fee of $40.

Damages and Fees:

Missing, Damaged, or Soiled Items:

- Guests may be charged for missing items, damages, or excessive wear and tear on the property.

- Minimum $200 service fee may apply.

Check-Out:

- Guests are requested to leave the property tidy and bag garbage for proper disposal.

Hot Tub and Fire Pit Rules (If Applicable):

- Please put the hot tub cover back on after each use.

- Treat the hot tub with respect, including not having glass nearby and rinsing off any lotions/self-tanner before entering.

- Any damage to the hot tub will result in a loss of the security deposit or an Airbnb claim.

Wood Burning Fire Pit (if applicable):

 **Responsible use only! The fire department drives down the rural roads regularly to shut down fires that are too big and handing out fines. You will be responsible for any fines given. Please put the fire out completely before turning in for the night.

Penalties:

- Lost keys: $100 rekey

- Late checkout past 10:00/11:00am without our consent: $500

- Excessive guests beyond the reservation: $25 per guest, per night + $500 fine.

- Excessive cleaning if the place is left filthy with trash: Minimum $50, dependent on severity.

hosts.about: I love to travel and explore at every opportunity that I get. Whether it's checking out different places at home or exploring a city in another part of the world, I enjoy learning and seeking out new adventures.

I have a deeply optimistic nature, and traveling serves as a powerful reminder for me to be grateful for the life I have been blessed with. It allows me to witness the awe-inspiring beauty of God's creation firsthand. With a belief that life is fleeting, I aspire to embark on more adventures, embracing every opportunity to live life to its fullest potential.

We are Midhula & Taylor! We're dedicated to making the most of every property we manage & creating opportunities for both owners and guests alike. In major cities & cottage country, our properties are handpicked, to meet the highest standards of quality & comfort. 

Our team is passionate about hosting and is always ready to assist you. Whether you are looking to stay in one of our properties or would like help hosting yours, we are here to help!

description.space:
Welcome to this Luxury Lakefront Villa! Indulge in the awe-inspiring and panoramic vistas of Lake Ontario that adorn this remarkable home, offering you an unparalleled and breathtaking backdrop for your well-deserved vacation. Prepare to be captivated by the expansive scenery that seamlessly blends with your tranquil retreat, ensuring an unforgettable experience.

Step inside and discover over 3000 square feet of exquisite craftsmanship of our thoughtfully curated lakehouse. Beautiful hardwood floors run throughout the house, while a glass and maple staircase adds a touch of elegance. Our home features balconies on five levels, perfect for taking in breathtaking sunrises and cool lake breezes.

★ KITCHEN & DINING ★
 Our spectacular kitchen boasts quartz countertops and a waterfall island, along with high-end built-in appliances that make cooking a breeze. Conveniences includes:

✔ All bedrooms have Queen sized beds

Please note the TVs in the bedrooms do not have remotes, however, you can plug in a chrome cast or external hard drive to use them.

Book your stay today and experience the ultimate lake house vacation!

description.notes:
HOTTUB: Experience comfort at its best with our property's exceptional amenity – a state-of-the-art heating system to keep you cozy and warm throughout your stay.

SAFETY: The path to the water is steep and can be slippery. Please use at your own risk!

SECURITY CAMERAS: There are 2 outdoor security cameras facing the front entrance area of the property:
1 security camera located on top of the garage facing the driveway
1 security camera on top of the front door on the outside, facing the front entrance
Both cameras are activated upon motion-detection.

While we do consider late checkouts, they will be evaluated on a case-by-case basis. We aim to accommodate guests whenever possible, but it will depend on the specific circumstances and availability. Feel free to inquire about a late checkout, and we will do our best to accommodate your request if feasible.

✸Late checkouts without prior approval will incur a fee of $100.00. It's essential to request and receive approval for a late checkout to avoid additional charges. We appreciate your understanding and cooperation in adhering to our policies.
description.neighborhood:
Nestled on the picturesque shores of Lake Ontario, this waterfront house in Stoney Creek, Ontario offers the perfect escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. The location is truly unbeatable, offering unobstructed views of the sparkling waters and endless opportunities for outdoor recreation.

Enjoy early morning swims or kayak sessions right from your own private lake access to Lake Ontario. Take leisurely strolls along the waterfront trails or explore the nearby conservation areas. And when the sun sets, sit back and relax on the deck with a glass of wine, watching as the colors of the sky reflect off the tranquil waters.

But the location isn't just about natural beauty – it's also incredibly convenient. Located just a short drive from downtown Hamilton, you'll have access to all the amenities you need, from top-rated restaurants to boutique shopping and cultural attractions. And with easy access to the QEW highway, you're just a quick drive away from Niagara Falls and other popular destinations in the region.

Whether you're looking for a peaceful retreat or a base for exploring the best of Southern Ontario, this waterfront house is the perfect choice. Book your stay today and experience the beauty and convenience of lakeside living!
description.transit:
We recommend that guests have a vehicle for getting around. The house is easily accessed from the QEW. 

There are local taxis, Uber and Lyft in the area. 

The neighbourhood has many food delivery services including Door Dash, and Uber Eats.
description.interaction:
24/7 Support: We are available any time or day to answer any questions or concerns throughout your stay. We are always on call for you, please reach out any time!

Rest assured that we are always available remotely to assist you throughout your stay. Don't hesitate to reach out to us for any support or inquiries you may have. We are here to ensure your experience is nothing short of exceptional.
description.house_rules:
We have thoughtfully designed and setup this property with a lot of care. Please be respectful and treat it like your own. We strive to provide guests 5-star experience and hope you'll take care of the property during your stay! We ask that you follow all of our check in and check out rules to avoid any extra fees associated with damage or extra maintenance services.

1. Smoking is strictly prohibited in the property both indoors and outdoors, including on the balcony, deck, or patio. Guests who violate this rule will be charged a fee to cover the cost of any necessary cleaning or repairs. If we find evidence of smoking in the unit, a $500 charge will apply.

2. The hottub rules must be followed closely and carefully. Any damages will be charged back to the guest, including a $500 penalty. The hottub cover must be on and clipped anytime the hottub is not being used.

3. Garbage and recycling must be bagged using the bags provided, and secured in the bins provided. A $100 cleaning and garbage disposal fee will apply if this is not adhered to.

4. Please note that the check out time is 11 a.m., and a late checkout fee of $100 per hour will apply if you have not vacated by then. Late check outs interfere with our cleaner's schedules and result in higher cleaning charges.

5. All outdoor furniture cushions must be stored properly upon check out. 

6. Pets are not permitted at the property. Any evidence of pets will result in a $300 charge for extra cleaning.

7. The key must be returned to the lockbox safely. Any lost or stolen keys will result in a $350 locksmith fee.

8. Our cleaning crews count towels and sheets before and after your stay. If there are missing towels or sheets, OR if the towels/sheets are stained beyond repair, there will be a charge of $25 per towel and $50 per sheet.

9. Please be extremely careful when using the kayak on the lake or transporting it. Any damage to the kayak, or losing the kayak, will result in a $500 fine.

10. The property can accommodate 8 guests maximum. Any extra guests at the property will result in an additional fee of $50 per guest, unless previously agreed to with the host.

An amazing find for the 3 of us, Nick was responsive from the beginning and had clear instructions about the check-in, rules. An amazing view and an amazing location for a night over or a few days to stay, lots of things are accessible from that point. The flat is fully furnished, we had lots of towels, shampoos and a hair dryer as well.

Unfortunately, due to burst pipes in the unit, our reservation was cancelled on the day of our arrival. Hamming very quickly contacted me and had already started the process of fully refunding me and arranging to help find other accommodations. So, although I can't comment on the spot, Hamming's communication throughout the booking process and cancellation was quick and very helpful. I would feel comfortable booking with him again.

Perfect location. Picturesque views. So much to do within walking distance and street car and subway just minutes away. The unit has all the basic things you would need for your stay. Wifi was super fast, and the new TV was beautiful. We’ll be back for sure!

description.notes:
Parties and gatherings at Airbnb houses are illegal by the City of Toronto bylaw and banned by Airbnb's global anti-party policy. 

No special events, commercial activity, photoshoots, video making, outside guests are allowed. Anyone that is not a confirmed guest entering the condo for any reason is considered a social gathering. (If you have immediate family who needs to visit, please inform me before booking.)

There are surveillance cameras right outside the condo. There is decibel alarm equipment (noise-aware) (can only be triggered by large-scale parties). If any social gathering is scheduled, we will know. We will call the police, remove you from the condo immediately, and pursue legal action against you for any breach of contract, disturbance, or damages. (not joking) Your entire booking fee and security deposit will also not be returned to you.

This condo is only to be used for lodging purposes.

I sincerely hope this policy will also bring comfort and peace of mind to all my guests, knowing I host Airbnb responsibly. It is for our mutual safety.

We also observe Airbnb's new pilot program in Toronto that requires guests to be 25+ to book entire homes. We will regrettably not be able to host your stay If your group is mostly under 25.

This is a residential condo with mostly long term residents. Noise should be kept to a minimum at all times. Please do not disturb the neighbors in any way. Please see our house rules section for more detailed policies regarding this unit.

Please message me with any questions regarding this before booking.
description.transit: 5 minutes walking distance to Union train station. Union Station is the central transportation hub in Toronto. Pearson airport train shuttle is also connected with Union Station.
description.interaction: Just give me a text / call if you have any questions during your stay. I grew up in Toronto and will be glad to chat with you regarding any Toronto locales.
description.house_rules:
HOUSE RULE

Please go over these standard rules sent to every guest.

BY ACCEPTING THE BOOKING YOU AGREE TO THE FOLLOWING RULES:

1. Government photo ID is needed for booking.

2. No Parties, loud noises, or any type of social gathering.

This is a residential condo and no excessive noise is permitted in the building. No Parties, loud noises, or any type of social gathering. There are surveillance cameras right outside the unit. There is a decibel alarm (noiseaware) in the unit. If any party or social gathering is scheduled security will come and remove you from the unit immediately and issue a $1200 fine. (not joking) Your entire booking fee and security deposit will also not be returned to you. Only confirmed guests will be permitted to enter the room. Anyone not on the confirmed guest list entering the room is defined to be a social gathering. We also do not allow any pre-party staging or post-party stays.

3. No smoking.

No Smoking is allowed anywhere in the building.

If smoke is detected in the unit, then we will not be able to rent out the room to the next guest until we hire a special Ozone cleaner at $300. The cost will be deducted from your security deposit.

4. No drug and marijuana use.

We will report and cooperate with any law enforcement if you decide to use any drugs in the condo.

If any marijuana smell is detected by us or the neighbors, we will report you to the condo management and call the police immediately. You will be evicted from the condo. We will charge you a minimum of $500 for cleaning up the smell. Your reservation fee and security deposit will not be refunded.

5. All condos and city by-laws must be observed. Social distancing measures, mandatory mask requirements are in place.

6. Must be 25+ to book.

Not suitable for pets

Please do not stain the towels. Do not wipe makeup on the towels. Any ruined towels will be charged $15 each to your deposit.

Please remove your shoes while in the suite

Please ensure you clean up after yourself and place all garbage in the bins. There is a garbage room right beside the elevator.

Check in is 3 PM - 12 Midnight. Please contact me prior to booking to verify availability if you need to check in after midnight. Check out is at 11AM.

I deeply apologize for having these rules, but they are very necessary so everyone can enjoy their stay in the condo.

recent.comments: Our stay at Jaclyn's place was amazing and well worth. Place was beautiful and clean. Amenities were great. The check in and out process was simple and didnt need to communicate with the host at all because everything was in place and smooth. Place itself has a great interior design and the surrounding woods made the place even better. Lots of firewood were provided to enjoy outdoor fire. Overall great experience. items.comments: Our stay at Jaclyn's place was amazing and well worth. Place was beautiful and clean. Amenities were great. This was our first experience with Airbnb and our stay exceeded our expectations. The chalet was extremely clean, well furnished and well equipped. The beds were very comfortable. The chalet was in a quiet, secluded area, surrounded by nature, and just minutes from town. We enjoyed meals outside on the wraparound deck, relaxing in the spacious spa and spending quiet, starry evenings at the fire pit. Jaclyn was extremely attentive and always responded promptly to our to our questions and requests. We have already booked our next stay at the chalet!
This was an amazing place to stay!! Very spacious, clean, and beautiful view of the forest!  Gorgeous, will be back!!

The most beautiful air b&b we have stayed at. This beautiful house was hidden up in the woods, with a beautiful deck and hot tub, with a cool fireplace right off the house. The hiking trail right behind the house was super cool too. Seems so far away, although town is only about 7 minutes away. The house is better than the pictures. Kitchen was equipped with more than we expected. So much space for all 9 of us to be there comfortably. We even ended up adding an extra day because we just weren’t ready to leave!! Can’t wait to come back. Thank you Jaclyn, for your great hospitality!!
Such a perfect space, we had the best time!!
Had the best time this weekend. Always looking for a great getaway and this hit the spot. 10/10 recommend. Will come back again.
This place is everything you would want in a secluded Ellicottville chalet. Absolutely fantastic.

description.summary:
Kick back and relax in this  stylish chalet nestled in the trees. 

This gorgeous chalet features a hot tub, wood burning fireplace in the spacious great room, outdoor firepit,  direct access to hiking & snowshoe trails from the property,  chefs kitchen and a stunning Master with a huge ensuite & soaker tub.

Located only 2 miles from the Main EVL strip and close to the ski clubs, you have the best of both worlds - privacy & location.

It is truly a unique and special property to discover!
description.space:
MASTER BEDROOM SANCUARY AND ENSUITE

The stunning master retreat is on it's own level for extra privacy and has a King bed with high quality linens and pillows and a a large Smart TV to access any Netflix/Amazon accounts you may have.

There is an oversized spa-like zen ensuite with a soaker tub, double floating vanity and spacious walk in shower. Light a candle and relax in the tub for the ultimate escape.

KITCHEN + DINING AREA

The chefs kitchen is quaint open-space concept space with a gas stove, sub-zero fridge, dishwasher and microwave. Perch up to the beautiful soapstone island on one of the three bar stools.

The kitchen has pots, pans, dishware, cutlery, baking sheets, wine glasses and most things you will need to enjoy lovely meals inside. We also provide BBQ utensils for grilling season.

We have both a Keurig and a regular drip coffee pot as well as an electric tea kettles. We provide ground coffee and tea bags to get your mornings started right! We also offer basic kitchen amenities such as olive oil, salt, pepper, aluminum foil and plastic wrap.

The adjacent dining and a dining table that can fit up to 8 guests.


LIVING ROOM:

The living room has a cozy wood burning fireplace, an oversized sectional couch and  a coffee table. We supply logs for the fireplace inside as well as extra stacked outside should you go through those. 

It is a great spot to hang out, play board games, read or just enjoy the stunning views over the vast forest outside.


GUEST BEDROOMS + LOWER LEVEL

There are two beautiful bedrooms are located on the main level and have very comfortable Queen sized beds with high quality linens. Both bedrooms have closets and there is a full bathroom located nearby.

The above ground lower level has a small living area, a bedroom with two double beds, a Smart TV and a powder room. 

The coffee table is a chest that has some board games and children's toys to enjoy.


BATHROOMS & LAUNDRY:

There are 2.5 bathrooms in the chalet. There is a full bathroom attached to the master bedroom upstairs, a full bathroom on the main level shared by the two guest bedrooms as well as a half bathroom in the basement. 

There is a stackable washer and dryer on the main level and laundry detergent is provided. 

Regular bath, face hand towels as well as hot tub towels are provided.


OUTDOOR SPACE / HOT TUB / FIREPIT / PARKING

Guests have access to all outdoor amenities. There is a spacious deck overlooking the trees with a hot tub, propane BBQ, dining table and Adirondack chairs. 

Our Hot tub is inspected by a spa professional on a weekly basis to maintain optimal water quality. We also provide firewood and kindling for the fireplace. 

Out front there is a bonfire pit with Adirondack chairs to enjoy roasting marshmallows and hanging out. 

We provide some lawn games/activities including corn home, two yoga mats etc. Lastly, there is ample parking for up to 5 vehicles. 


LOCATION

Located high up on Ridge Road and nestled amongst the trees. Here are distances to local places:

HoliMont Ski Club: 1.4 miles
Downtown Ellicottville: 2 - 2.5 miles
Holiday Valley Ski Resort: 3.5 miles



OTHER INCLUDED ITEMS
- Free wifi
- Washer & Dryer
- Hot Tub
- a Pack and Play & high chair for the little ones

recent.comments: Really good place for some relaxing days

items.comments: Really good place for some relaxing days
Best place to stay

This was my second time staying at Beck’s place and it was very enjoyable as usual. The place is exactly as described or even better. You can’t miss this paradise especially the breathtaking views of Lake Ontario. The place has all amenities to relax, enjoy the sunshine and feel comfortable.

Beck has a gorgeous house with an amazing outdoor living space right on Lake Ontario.  Sunrise and sunset are beautiful! There is takeout and shopping near by. Also  Beck is very responsive and answered my question right away. ( I didn’t know how to turn on the fireplace lol)
Very nice place. Quiet, with a spectacular view.

The views of the lake are stunning however the cleanliness of the house left me upset . I chose this house not only because of the location but the Superhost  status .It was not at this level . The outside area was full of spiderwebs , dining table filthy and area had not been cleaned in a long time .Inside the countertops were grimy and there were bugs in the windowsills.There were extremely expired eggs in the refrigerator. I do not believe there is a professional cleaning company due to the fact that we found a dirty diaper on the floor in the basement guest room . Although Beck  was responsive when I asked about an iron and extra towels I appreciated the effort but it wasn’t enough to minimize the other issues. There also weren’t enough instructions in the house for appliances or navigating things in the house  or a book of recommendations, the little added touches that go along with a Superhost.Once the dirty diaper was found I lost any comfort level I initially had in this house.

Really fantastic host and quick to respon. The house is amazing also, just a few important little things need to be improved in my opinion. The lack of stuff like extra towels,  hand towels, cookware, all the clutter and dust on all the stuff, and the spider webs everywhere that have been around for a while made things annoying. But with that said the place was still amazing and made even better by having a great host who is aware of my comments and intends to make some changes for future guest. all in all if changes are made I definitelyrecommend

The property was superb and clean during our 2 day stay. Good cul-de-sac neighborhood. All fans and lights were working. All kitchen cabinets and cupboards were labeled, and it was  easy to find kitchen  stuff.

But I would suggest providing more water bottles since it is a 5 BR house. For hygienic  purposes, it is better to provide a personal size of toothpaste and brush. Maybe some beds need to be replaced, as it was sagging.

Overall, it is excellent. I will consider coming back again.

I had a great time staying at Kim’s place with my family. It’s very spacious and has  all the amenities that you could possibly think of (appreciate the snacks, bottled water etc.). The kitchen is beautiful and has everything you need. There are plenty of stores around the area (two Walmarts within 2 mile radius ) restaurants, and Asian supermarkets to get everything you need. The location is also pretty close to downtown Toronto (35 min drive), as well as to Richmond Hill and Markham where there are plenty of great Asian restaurant. Would definitely come back in the future for my next visit.

Excellent stay at Kim's home. Very well equipped and every detail well thought out. Very spacious and comfortable for our family. Our extended family thoroughly enjoyed the stay. Thank you for sharing your beautiful home Kim! :)

This house was absolutely perfect for our trip! We had everything we needed and the location was wonderful!
Beautiful place and very close to town.
Another great stay!

The house was perfect for our group of 10 which included 6 kids. It has adequate bedrooms, towels, amenities; was clean, and is very nicely decorated. We had an issue with getting hot water but Jaclyn responded immediately and resolved the issue. We thought that the house was literally at the base of Holimont but it's actually across the main street and up a road across from the Holimont neighborhood entrance and so you still have to drive to the lodge. That said, it only took a few minutes to get there and just a few minutes longer to get to Holiday Valley so the house was still a great location for skiing. The downtown area is super fun. It's a touch far from the house and the roads aren't very walkable so plan to drive. I highly recommend this house!

description.summary:
Welcome to this beautiful wood-beam chalet, only minutes to downtown Ellicottville, Holiday Valley and Holi-Mont.

This gorgeous 5 bedroom, 2.5 bath chalet is the perfect place to get away with family & friends. There are two spacious living rooms and a great outdoor space including a hot tub and barrel sauna.

The chalet is nestled in the trees and is flooded with natural light throughout. Complete with many amenities, it is the perfect home-away-from home for your family and friends to enjoy!
description.space:
LIVING ROOM / DINING ROOM / KITCHEN

The spacious 2 story great room is flooded with natural light and overlooks the trees. Cozy up next to the gas fire place, put on a show on the large TV or enjoy view or direct access to the deck out the large windows.

Cook up a meal in the full kitchen that is fully stocked a big fridge/freezer, dishwasher, gas stove and dishes, pots, pans, cutlery & small appliances.

There is also a Keurig, regular drip coffee pot and kettle for all of your coffee and tea needs!

The kitchen opens to the bright dining room with a large table that seats 8 people.

OUTDOOR SPACE & AMENITIES

The upper deck off of the main living room has a BBQ, Dining table and lounge area with Adirondack chairs. Corn hole and other games are provided!

The lower outdoor space off of the lower level rec room has a hot tub to relax in as well as a barrel sauna. Spa towels are provided!

LOWER LEVEL REC ROOM

This second living area is a great spot to get the group together - adults and kids alike.

There is plenty of seating, a huge Smart TV (cable & Netflix / other app access), a bar area with a wine fridge, Air Hockey, Foosball and board games. 

BEDROOMS

The master bedroom is located on the main level and has a King bed, TV and an ensuite. There is a guest bedroom on the main level with a Queen bed, TV and closet. 

Upstairs there is a loft bedroom with two Twin beds, a dresser, desk and and additional AC unit for the summer heat.

The lower level has a second master bedroom with a King Bed, TV and closet and another cool guest bunk bedroom with 2 Double beds and 2 Twin beds plus a TV and chalk wall for kid fun.

In addition, there is a large air mattress (plug in pump, with linens) as well as a pack and play for additional sleeping.

BATHROOMS

The master bedroom has an ensuite with a separate tub and shower as well as his and hers vanities with lots of storage space.

The lower level has a spacious two room bathroom - the first has a tub/shower, toilet and sink and there is a separate vanity area.

The main level has a powder room.

OTHER AMENITIES

- Free Wifi
- Air Conditioning
- Children Items provided: Pack & Play, high chair & games
- Linens, Bath & Spa Towels provided
- Free parking for up to 4 cars
- Desk located in loft
- Washer and Dryer is located in the lower level laundry room. Detergent is provided
- Hair Dryers provided

description.summary: Welcome to our stunning custom-built home in a family friendly neighbourhood in East York, Toronto. This spacious 4 BED, 3.5 BA home is perfect for families, groups of friends & travelling professionals who are looking for a luxurious & spacious place to stay! Our central location provides easy access to all the city has to offer, including downtown Toronto, the CN Tower and much more by vehicle or public transit. Our close proximity to public transportation makes it easy to get around the city!
description.space:
Welcome to our luxurious and spacious custom-built home in East York, Toronto! 

Our large eat-in kitchen features top-of-the-line stainless steel appliances and kitchen island with barstool seating. The kitchen is fully equipped for all your cooking needs, whether you're preparing a quick breakfast or a gourmet meal.

The dining room is spacious and elegant, with a gorgeous accent wall that adds a touch of sophistication to the space.

All four bedrooms are beautifully decorated and feature comfortable beds and linens. The primary bedroom has a full ensuite bathroom and a king-size bed. There are also two bedrooms with queen-size beds and one bedroom with a double bed, providing plenty of sleeping space for everyone.

The basement is the perfect place to relax and unwind, with an entertainment and lounging area that features a large flat-screen TV and a small basketball net for added entertainment.

The backyard is fully fenced in and offers plenty of space to enjoy the outdoors. You can relax by the fire pit or gather around the outdoor seating area for a meal or conversation. The driveway can accommodate parking for one vehicle. Additional street parking is available by city permit.

With modern finishes throughout, this custom-built home provides a luxurious and comfortable place to stay in East York, Toronto. Book now and experience the best of city living!
description.access: Please note that this house is a semi-detached home. Guests have private access to the house, driveway and fully fenced backyard.
description.notes: No pets, parties / events or smoking indoors.
description.neighborhood:
Our home is located in the heart of East York, a charming and family-friendly neighbourhood in Toronto. The house is situated on a quiet tree-lined street, within walking distance to a wide range of amenities, including shops, restaurants, parks, and public transportation.

The location of this property is ideal for guests who want to explore all that Toronto has to offer. Downtown Toronto is just a short drive or subway ride away, providing easy access to popular attractions such as the CN Tower, Rogers Centre, and the Toronto Islands.

For guests who prefer to stay closer to home, the nearby Danforth Avenue offers a vibrant and diverse neighbourhood filled with restaurants, cafes, and shops. You can also explore the many parks in the area, including Stan Wadlow Park, Taylor Creek Park, and the Don Valley Trail, all of which offer scenic walking and biking trails.

No matter what your interests are,  our home offers the perfect base to explore East York and beyond.
description.transit:
Within minutes you enter the DVP, the main road/highway entering the city and directly connecting you with the many neighborhoods of the greater Toronto area.
Not feeling to take the car? The bus stop is 100m away dropping you off at either Donlands, Broadview, or Pape Stations.

description.summary:

 This is a one bedroom, one bathroom unit with kitchen living dining and den areas.

description.space:
The critics have spoken! This five star rated,professionally  designed unit is fresh and functional . The art work and accessories were carefully chosen to accentuate your positive living experience. The  Luxury medium firm, queen size bed by Kings down is made with luxurious linens and beautiful plush pillows.  
 The kitchen is equipped with a Nespresso coffee maker, a french press,a kettle, a toaster and enough appliances to make yourself a  meal including a special breakfast egg/ toster appliance to make breakfast easy. The television has a full cable package so you can catchup on news, tv shows, AMC 
CNN, local weather etc. High speed Wifi included!!!
 The bathroom provides luxury soaps, shampoos and conditioner, plush white towels , A blow dryer and many more things to keep you in comfort .
description.access: This is a one bedroom, one bathroom unit with kitchen living dining and den areas. The curtains in the bedroom are fully black out for your sleeping comfort.A fully charged printer with ink and fax is on site In the den area beside the laptop functional desk, with multiple power outlets.The nightstands provide USB charging stations.There is a fully equipped gym on the 3rd floor for your use. Check in time is 3 PM the day of arrival and check out time is 11 AM the day of departure.
description.notes: There is a high end grocery store called Whole Foods across the street in the Yorkville  mall where you can buy everything you need in terms of grocery. A Nespresso store is located  on Cumberland directly across from the building. You won’t need to go far to find great shops, restaurants, patios, and all things entertainment. There are several coffee shops a walk away including Starbucks.
description.neighborhood: Yorkville is a bustling neighbourhood in the centre of Toronto, within walking distance of the Royal Ontario Museum, the Art Gallery of Ontario, theatres, the best shopping in Canada, and the finest restaurants, both casual and elegant.
description.transit:
There are many parking arcades in the vicinity, and you are steps away from 2 subway stations, the Yorkville subway station, and the Bay Street subway station. The fair starts at $3.25 Cad per person per ride, but you can also buy a day pass at a stated fair. There are TTC operators in every subway to help you with this transaction. 
Uber in Toronto is a super efficient way to get around at a good price, Just make sure that you have loaded the Uber app on your phone and all will go well. 
Taxicabs in Toronto are easy to find especially in this neighbourhood and for short trips are very economical, safe, and efficient. 
I would recommend taking a long walk to discover everything the city has to offer. You never know what you might find. It is a city City of gems👣👣👣
description.interaction: I am available as the host of this unit for check-in to fully introduce you to the amenities and facilities provided. Other than that I am available By phone or text to answer any questions or concerns, give advice and recommendations, anything I can do to make your stay more comfortable.
